briefTitle: Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of Saxagliptin in Combination With Metformin in Adult Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
officialTitle: A 24-Week International, Multi-centre, Randomized, Parallel-group, Double-blind, Placebo-Controlled, Phase III Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Saxagliptin in Combination With Metformin in Adult Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Who Have Inadequate Glycaemic Control on Metformin Therapy
summary: Saxagliptin is a new investigational medication being developed for treatment of type 2 diabetes. This study is designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety in adult patients who have inadequate glycaemic control when treated with metformin in addition to diet and exercise.

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change From Baseline to Week 24 in Glycosylated Haemoglobin A1c (HbA1c)
